about_the_game:
Click the image above to join the Discord!
Or use the following link:


A mysterious wave of serial murders have begun to hit Tokyo, with crime scenes defying explanation. As one of the "Lucky Two", you've beaten the odds, and won a contest that grants you a luxurious spot in a pop idol's world tour; promising the adventure of a lifetime. With Tokyo as your first stop, however, events quickly escalate. You'll soon become an important figure in a struggle that spans multiple worlds, and their puzzling connection. You may not only be the key to solving these mysterious murders - but you may hold the fate of all existence in your hands as well. Enjoy your adventure, and choose wisely...


  • Completely Re-written Script
  • Tons of new dialogue choices. (Seriously, tons)
  • QoL Features, Save Anywhere, etc...
  • Length Of Several Novels
  • Forge Bonds With Your Choices (A romance was added, too!)
  • Multiple Endings

short_description: Become intertwined in the fateful connection plaguing two worlds, bound together by a murder mystery, and a competition for the throne of a god. The award-winning visual novel, completely revamped! New script, new choices, and romance! Become The Savior today, and choose wisely...
